Review Title: Es fiel a los sabores japoneses y la elaboración muy cuidada
Review Text: La tempura muy bien hecha y buena calidad en todo. Muy recomendable!! Está en una zona de restaurantes en la que hay varios de buen nivel

Review Text: Nhà hàng đẹp lạ mà món ăn tươi ngon thật. Rất thích. Còn có món chay nữa. Very good. Excellent vegetarian menu too.

Review Title: Excellent for Vietnamese snd Japanese food
Review Text:
We ordered from the Japanese menu
Roll with Wayu beef - it was a bit dimple just rice and wayu beef - would not order again
Miso soup with mushroom - small portion but exquisite - wanted more
Noodles with beef - very tasty
Also green tea pot
Price amazing - bellow expectations
Service very good but the personnel had a hard time understanding or explaining, but tried hard
If we would stay longer definitively ‘a be back place’
Very nice, good sushi for a nice evening out for dinner. Enjoyed and would come back next time I visit Ho Chi Minh City. Thank you

Perfect

Beautiful dishes and table
Good service

Parking
Very beautiful restaurant snd can buy many decoration and plates or others

Endroit très calme et service au top.
Nous avons passé un agréable moment en famille.
Cuisine fusion japonaise intéressante pour un budget plus élevé.

Review Text: I was looking for a Japanese restaurant and I found that this place had food and very attentive service. Very good value for money.
Fantastic dinner, beautiful fusion meal that I would recommend to anyone looking for a great meal. The service and food is outstanding.

Review Title: The food was excellent and very flavorful
Review Text: There is a large menu with many choices. The food was excellent and very flavorful. They also have IPA beer, which is always a good reason to visit a local spot. My girlfriend and I had a wonderful time there. We would like to repeat the experience
Absolutely amazing food and Service. Ask for nhu. The ambience and every part of it is amazing. A blend of Japanese and Vietnamese with vegetarian options

Serveuse très souriante et attentionnée (a ramener une cuillère pour sauver le repas !)super accueil, belle présentation des plats et très goûteux.
Je recommande
Very tasty vegan selection. The vegan tempura was particularly tasty, with a great mix of flavors. Definitely recommend dinner out
The restaurant has a huge variety of Japanese and Vietnamese food and a great menu with vegetarian and vegan options. Staff is very friendly.

Review Text: Fantastic service and friendly staff. Delicious food and a lovely atmosphere. We came for lunch and two of us had Japanese Waygu beef - out of this world. The other had Vietnamese noodles which were also delicious. Would definitely recommend.
Awesome Vietnamese dinner with cozy atmosphere. Staffs were friendly and attentive. Foods were served promptly after order.

Review Title: Best Vietnamese and japanese food. Can recommand!
Review Text:
Really tasty food, high quality.
Good service as well, very friendly. I can recommand this restaurant very much to travellers, who like Japanese and Vietnamese food.

Review Text: Absolutely wonderful food - good flavours and sauces. Fantastic choice on the menu coupled with good service and friendly staff. Highly recommend

Review Title: Fantastisk og autentisk japansk køkken. Et virkelig stort og spændende menukort. Både japanske men også vietnamesiske læ
Review Text: Et virkelig stort og spændende menukort. Både japanske men også vietnamesiske lækre retter. Meget  autentisk og super god betjening.

Review Title: Chill café in the centre of HCMC
Review Text: We came here by chance and were really impressed with the menu range  - Japanese, Vietnamese and Vegetarian. There was an excellent choice of alcohol-free drinks - we enjoyed the avocado and almond smoothie and the dragon fruit and lychee mocktail. The food was delicious and beautifully presented. There was a lovely, calm ambience in the cafe, with classical music and lots of interesting ceramics on display for sale. Service was friendly and unrushed.
Ottimo Ristorante ben gestito con personale molto attento. Ci siamo trovati molto bene. Ottimo cibo giapponese e vietnamita
Ambiente calmo e agradável. O sushi estava muito bom, especialmente o Salmon Uramaki with Mango Sauce. Voltaremos a dois ou com amigos.
cibo vietnamita e giapponese molto buono, perdonale di servizio molto gentile e professionale,rapporto qualita prezzo corretto
Gran lugar, muy buen sabor, excelente ubicación y atención. Precio razonable para la zona y calidad. Recomendado 100%

Review Text: Great food, Great Ambience! Would love to visit again! Highly recommend pumpkin soup and vegetable pancake. Great choice for vegetarians also!

Not great. Ordered vegetable rice and some spring rolls with skin(?) We waited for an half an hour for the rice and about 20minutes after the rolls came. There were plenty of staff but no one doing the job. The Food was cold and tasted like plain rice. The only taste came from the soy sauce. Charged us extra from the wet wipes that were served to everyone. No after care and for the price totally NOT worth it. Waste of time and money.
